lacking.translation[0].definitions[0].de: not having enough of something or any of it
lacking.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The new designs have all been found lacking in some important way.
She seems to be entirely lacking in intelligence.
lacking.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if something that you need or want is lacking, it does not exist
lacking.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Financial backing for the project is still lacking.
These qualities are sadly lacking today.
